markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Master Monster Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=521) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 175 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10); [Monster Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=493)

</column>

---

You have a nearly encyclopedic knowledge of all creatures of the world. You can use Nature to Recall Knowledge to identify any creature. In addition, you gain the benefits of Monster Hunter (and Monster Warden, if you have it) on a success as well as a critical success.

<title level="2">Master Monster Hunter leads to...</title>
[Legendary Monster Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=537)
name: Master Monster Hunter
